nodes.notes: Processa dados e identifica o que precisa ser confirmado

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "from": "{{ $json.from }}",
  "fromName": "{{ $json.fromName }}",
  "messageId": "{{ $json.messageId }}",
  "extractedData": {
    "amount": {{ $json.amount }},
    "type": "{{ $json.type }}",
    "date": "{{ $json.date }}",
    "description": "{{ $json.description }}",
    "category": "{{ $json.category }}",
    "possibleCategories": {{ JSON.stringify($json.possibleCategories) }},
    "categoryConfidence": {{ $json.categoryConfidence }},
    "needsCategoryConfirmation": {{ $json.needsCategoryConfirmation }},
    "contextId": "{{ $json.contextId }}",
    "contextConfidence": {{ $json.contextConfidence }},
    "needsContextConfirmation": {{ $json.needsContextConfirmation }},
    "payer": {{ $json.payer ? JSON.stringify($json.payer) : 'null' }},
    "receiver": {{ $json.receiver ? JSON.stringify($json.receiver) : 'null' }},
    "transactionId": {{ $json.transactionId ? JSON.stringify($json.transactionId) : 'null' }},
    "bank": {{ $json.bank ? JSON.stringify($json.bank) : 'null' }},
    "account": {{ $json.account ? JSON.stringify($json.account) : 'null' }},
    "notes": {{ $json.notes ? JSON.stringify($json.notes) : 'null' }},
    "attachmentUrl": "{{ $json.attachmentUrl }}",
    "confidence": {{ $json.confidence }}
  },
  "confirmationMessage": "{{ $json.confirmationMessage }}"
}
